rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明减少青少年体育活动的社会经济差异具有经济效益如果消除社会经济地位较低和较高的青少年之间现有的身体活动水平差异，会发生什么？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-shows-the-economic-benefits-of-reducing-socioeconomic-disparities-in-youth-physical-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-shows-the-economic-benefits-of-reducing-socioeconomic-disparities-in-youth-physical-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01799460-a077-4738-8e22-5d8cfe20e36b Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:52:00 -0400 Study shows the economic benefits of reducing socioeconomic disparities in youth physical activity
机器学习分类器减少了识别个性化肿瘤反应性 T 细胞受体的时间目前为癌症患者进行个性化T细胞疗法至少需要六个月的时间；德国癌症研究中心 (DKFZ) 和曼海姆大学医学中心的科学家们表明，为患者识别肿瘤反应性 T 细胞受体这一费力的第一步可以用机器学习分类器来取代，这次的分类器减半了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Machine-learning-classifier-reduces-the-time-to-identify-personalized-tumor-reactive-T-cell-receptors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Machine-learning-classifier-reduces-the-time-to-identify-personalized-tumor-reactive-T-cell-receptors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99ed70e5-3661-4d8f-a9ee-44ea5484e378 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:44:00 -0400 Machine learning classifier reduces the time to identify personalized tumor reactive T cell receptors
新的校准技术提高了微流体环境中力测量的准确性一项研究介绍了一种校准 FluidFM 微量移液器悬臂梁弹簧常数的新方法，这对于精确测量微流体环境中的力至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/New-calibration-technique-enhances-accuracy-of-force-measurements-in-microfluidic-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/New-calibration-technique-enhances-accuracy-of-force-measurements-in-microfluidic-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ab8a586-ea53-4f95-bbbe-532ce305c5e7 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:36:00 -0400 New calibration technique enhances accuracy of force measurements in microfluidic environments
UVA 研究可以帮助识别有长期肺部问题风险的 COVID-19 幸存者UVA Health 研究人员发现了一种潜在的方法来预测哪些重症 COVID-19 患者可能康复良好，哪些可能患有“长期”肺部问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/UVA-research-could-help-identify-COVID-19-survivors-at-risk-for-long-haul-lung-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/UVA-research-could-help-identify-COVID-19-survivors-at-risk-for-long-haul-lung-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37108ca2-098e-4bcd-904c-a1d40fb96782 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:28:00 -0400 UVA research could help identify COVID-19 survivors at risk for long-haul lung problems
研究揭示了 COVID-19 实验室起源的可能性COVID-19 的起源备受争议——大多数研究都集中在人畜共患起源上，但《风险分析》杂志的研究调查了非自然起源（即来自实验室）的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-reveals-the-possibility-of-a-laboratory-origin-of-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-reveals-the-possibility-of-a-laboratory-origin-of-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7697bb0b-c1d4-4819-8e43-99e92ba49dcb Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:19:00 -0400 Study reveals the possibility of a laboratory origin of COVID-19
非侵入性大脑刺激可以改变与人类行为相关的特定大脑机制明尼苏达大学双城分校的研究人员首次表明，非侵入性大脑刺激可以改变与人类行为直接相关的特定大脑机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Non-induced-brain-stimulation-can-change-special-brain-mechanism-linked-to- human-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Non-induced-brain-stimulation-can-change-special-brain-mechanism-linked-to- human-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bc06175-0b4f-4f3d-90d6-e571cf1efa70 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:12:00 -0400 Non-invasive brain stimulation can change specific brain mechanism linked to human behavior
抗生素耐药性流行率与患者年龄和性别有关根据发表在《PLOS Medicine》上的一项新研究，一个人的年龄和性别与对抗生素具有抗药性的细菌引起的血液感染的几率相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Antimicrobial-resistance-prevalence-tied-to-病人-age-and-sex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Antimicrobial-resistance-prevalence-tied-to-病人-age-and-sex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2f9801e-ae9d-4eb7-91f9-e3c6a3e97459 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:04:00 -0400 Antimicrobial resistance prevalence tied to patient age and sex
未来的制药商可以在新的国家卓越中心利用虚拟现实来发展他们的技能在伦敦大学学院成功资助竞标后，未来的药物和疫苗制造商将能够在新的国家卓越中心利用虚拟现实来发展他们的技能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Future-drug-makers-can-develop-their-skills-using-virtual-reality-at-new-national-Centre-of-Excellence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Future-drug-makers-can-develop-their-skills-using-virtual-reality-at-new-national-Centre-of-Excellence.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80ba11b8-3d1a-444f-a466-7a8f8eb66423 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:56:00 -0400 Future drug makers can develop their skills using virtual reality at new national Centre of Excellence
关注罕见疾病可以减轻肾脏疾病负担伦敦大学学院和英国肾脏协会领导的一项重大新研究表明，关注罕见疾病可以显着减轻患者和 NHS 的肾脏疾病负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Focusing-on-rare-conditions-could-reduce-kidney-disease-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Focusing-on-rare-conditions-could-reduce-kidney-disease-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ee2db8b-dd24-45d8-abf6-ed3c86472a24 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:49:00 -0400 Focusing on rare conditions could reduce kidney disease burden
SOPHiA GENETICS 和 UroCCR 开发的 AI 模型可预测肾癌研究的术后结果SOPHiA GENETICS 是一家云原生软件公司，也是数据驱动医学领域的领导者，它与法国肾癌研究网络合作开展了一项研究，使用多模式算法来帮助预测肾细胞癌患者的术后结果，结果最近发表在 npj Precision Oncology 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/AI-model-development-by-SOPHiA-GENETICS-and-UroCCR-predicts-post-operative-outcomes-in-kidney-cancer-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/AI-model-development-by-SOPHiA-GENETICS-and-UroCCR-predicts-post-operative-outcomes-in-kidney-cancer-study.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77bd4199-b554-4845-b7ad-b12ba0b122f4 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:43:00 -0400 AI model developed by SOPHiA GENETICS and UroCCR predicts post-operative outcomes in kidney cancer study
